item.title: Europe targets Apple and Google in antitrust crackdown, risking fresh Trump tariff clash
item.description: Google is likely to have broken new competition rules, while Apple is the first Big Tech firm to be ordered to comply in specific ways.

item.title: Trump’s tariffs and policies are putting America’s economy at risk: Consumer Technology Association CEO
item.description: Higher tariffs are already creating “cost shocks” for businesses, which for many will be passed on to consumers.

item.title: The Boeing Starliner astronauts have returned to Earth after nine long months stuck in space—but their $150,000 salary won’t come with overtime
item.description: In comparison, bankers in New York make an average of $111,000 annually, without the risk of being exposed to an indefinite stay in dark, noiseless, i...

item.title: Bitcoin is at its lowest price since November. Here’s what analysts say about buying the dip
item.description: The original cryptocurrency is down 30% from January highs because of Trump’s tariffs and inflation fears.

item.title: Autocrats and state-run media are celebrating Trump’s silencing of Voice of America, saying the storied news outlet was ‘discarded by its own government like a dirty rag’
item.description: "This is a major contribution to eliminating fake news," said Cambodia's former Prime Minister Hun Sen, who ruled his country for nearly four decades.
